overview.en: Bella is a suite of open finance products including automated yield farming tools, lending protocol, 1-click savings account, customized robo-advisor, and more. $BEL is the governance token in the Bella ecosystem. BEL holders can benefit from the following aspect: Fee Collection, Discount, Staking, Voting and Governance.
overview.zh: Bella Protocol是一站式的开放式金融平台，目前包括自动进行流动性挖矿的工具、借贷协议、一键储蓄账户、智能机器投顾等。Bella BEL是Bella生态系统中的治理代币，用户持有BEL可以享受收入分成，手续费折扣，质押奖励，投票和治理等权利。
